item.title: Billion Dollar Playground - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: A surprise guest, team tension and a dog threaten to spoil this luxury stay.

item.description: Art school, a car and a new man: yes, the girls have got it all.

item.description: Sam and the ghosts race to find Isaac.

item.title: Live Aid at 40: When Rock ’n’ Roll Took on the World - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: Bob Geldof organises a charity song for an Ethiopian famine, inspiring a global response.

item.description: A delivery driver is killed in a brutal daytime attack. Detectives launch a manhunt.

item.title: Scrublands - Series 2 - Silver: Episode 1
item.description: Hoping for a peaceful holiday, Martin Scarsden is perplexed by a strange call.

item.title: 7/7: The London Bombings - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: On 7 July 2005, four bombs explode. Is it a suicide attack? Will the bombers strike again?

item.title: The Kim Kardashian Diamond Heist
item.description: Who was behind the infamous gunpoint robbery of Kim Kardashian?

item.title: To Catch a Stalker - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: Zara meets Isobel and Jen as they face terrifying real-world stalkers.

item.title: Not Going Out - Series 14: 1. House Move
item.description: Lee and Lucy are moving house and view what they think is their forever home.

item.title: Ragdoll - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: A gruesome discovery sets detectives on the trail of the Ragdoll Killer.

item.title: The Gold - Series 2: Episode 1
item.description: The police chase the other half of the stolen Brink’s-Mat gold after it resurfaces.

item.title: The Traitors NZ - Series 2: Episode 1
item.description: Twenty-two everyday New Zealanders join Paul Henry at Claremont Manor.

item.title: My Super Sweet 16 - Lauren and Jackie
item.description: Jacqueline and Lauren are really close friends and choose to celebrate with a joint party.

item.title: King Richard
item.description: Richard Williams is determined to write daughters Venus and Serena into sporting history.

item.title: St Denis Medical - Series 1: 1. Welcome to St Denis
item.description: Matt gets off to a flier on his first day by injecting himself with an EpiPen.

item.description: Kath supports Diane. Martin has to swallow his pride. Nobody’s night goes to plan.

item.description: A deep dive into the BBC’s music archives for a celebration of Oasis.

item.description: A trip through the BBC’s music archives to explore the Electric Light Orchestra.

item.description: Documentary about musician-songwriter Jeff Lynne, with access to Jeff in his LA studio.

item.title: Couples Therapy - Series 4: Episode 11
item.description: Kyle reveals the origins of his sexual desires. Alison tries a new tactic.

item.title: The Elon Musk Show - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: Elon Musk’s rise from geeky tech entrepreneur to making millions.

item.title: Amol Rajan Goes to the Ganges
item.description: Amol Rajan makes a personal pilgrimage to the largest religious festival in history.

item.title: Walking With Dinosaurs - Series 1: 1. The Orphan
item.description: An orphaned baby triceratops must outwit a deadly T. rex. Can she survive?

item.description: DCI Kramer and her colleague Thomas Riedle head up the investigation of a missing woman.

item.title: Under the Vines - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: Two people arrive at the small vineyard each believes they have inherited outright.

item.title: Death Valley - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: DS Janie Mallowan solves a murder with national treasure and retired actor John Chapel.

item.title: The Last Anniversary - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: Sophie's arrival on an island threatens to unravel a string of long-held secrets.

item.title: Scandinavia with Simon Reeve - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: Simon travels from Arctic islands of Svalbard to the icy wilderness of Lapland.

item.title: The Moment of Proof - Series 4: Episode 1
item.description: A jacket left in a stolen car carries the DNA to prove who was driving.

item.description: Will and Kirsten help commemorate the victims of the Lockerbie bombing.

item.description: West Midlands Police track a violent killer after a man is fatally stabbed in a brothel.

item.title: Top Gear - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and Jason Dawe are joined by Harry Enfield.

item.description: Rose Tyler meets a mysterious stranger called the Doctor, and realises Earth is in danger.

item.title: Mrs Brown's Boys - Series 1: 1. The Mammy
